import { useEffect, useState } from 'react' import Loader from 'react-loaders' import AnimatedLetters from '../AnimatedLetters' import './index.scss' const Experience = () => { const [letterClass, setLetterClass] = useState('text-animate') useEffect(() => { setTimeout(() => { setLetterClass('text-animate-hover') }, 3000) }, []) return ( <>

HYPERGRYPH





Sep 2020 - Dec 2020

Shanghai, China







Software Engineer







Computer Science







Algorithms,

Computer Networks,

Web Development,



Data Base,

Cloud Computing,

Compilers,

iOS Development

) } export default Experience
